output.sentences: The man decided to take one selfie per day.
Although he was a male, he took one with his grandma on her birthday.
Although he was a male, he took one showing the difference between his friends' hair.
Because he was a male, while he was shaving off all his hair, he needed a female to assist him.
He thinks his new haircut looks boss. It doesn't.
